A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie has four scenes that I would like to see again\, but\, overall\, I disagree with nearly every choice that was made story-wise and character-wise. As a life-long Star Wars fan\, this movie is not for me. I really wanted to like this movie and I know that a lot of people worked really hard on it\, but this is a Disney movie with about as much heart as one of the soulless Pirates of the Caribbean sequels and as much intelligence as a Transformers film. I don't want to go into spoilers\, but it's barely passable as an action/adventure film and as a Star Wars movie\, it fails miserably.
